LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to use Queue Storage from .NET
How to use Queue Storage from .NET

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: // Create the queue client. CloudQueueClient queueClient = storageAccount.CreateCloudQueueClient();
// Get a reference to a queue named "messageQueue" CloudQueue messageQueue = queueClient.GetQueueReference("messageQueue");
